main_definition: Fitness refers to the overall physical health, condition, or ability of an individual to perform certain tasks or activities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The state of being physically fit and healthy
meanings_and_examples.example: Regular exercise and a balanced diet contribute greatly to one's overall fitness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A measure of how well your body can perform physical tasks or activities
meanings_and_examples.example: Running 10 miles without stopping is an indication of good cardiovascular fitness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The ability to perform a specific exercise correctly and efficiently
meanings_and_examples.example: To have proper form while doing squats means you're working on your muscular fitness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A training program designed to improve physical condition or performance
meanings_and_examples.example: He follows an intense workout routine every morning, which helps him maintain his fitness level.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The quality of being in good physical shape
meanings_and_examples.example: After her gym recovery session, she felt rejuvenated and more physically fit than before.
